room.name: ranssila
room.description:
You have entered Ranssila. You stand in a narrow room where you can see an open door ahead. You walk through it and enter an undecorated room with two tables covered with piles of clothes and a bed where someone has slept restlessly. The bed's bedsheets are hardly on the bed anymore. There is a sauna stove in a corner.
You can go east and south from here.
